name: ShowPlayerMarkers
tips: It is also possible to set a player's color to a color that has full transparency (no alpha value). This makes it possible to show markers on a per-player basis.
description: Toggles player markers (blips on the radar). Must be used when the server starts (OnGameModeInit). For other times, see SetPlayerMarkerForPlayer.

params_body.name: mode
params_body.description: The mode to use for markers. They can be streamed, meaning they are only visible to nearby players. See table below.

return_values: This function does not return any specific values.
related_fn:
SetPlayerMarkerForPlayer: Set a player's marker.
 LimitPlayerMarkerRadius: Limit the player marker radius.
 ShowNameTags: Set nametags on or off.
 SetPlayerColor: Set a player's color.
